info.name: Feats
info.description: Feats from The Compendium of Forgotten Secrets
info.author: Genuine Fantasy Press

description.p: You have been touched by the ruinous power of the Accursed Archive, and its secrets have granted you power. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Whe never you reduce a creature to 0 hit points, you can use your reaction to unleash a bloodcurdling scream. Choose a creature that you can see within 30 feet of you that can hear you. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw against DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier. If they fail, they are frightened until the start of your next turn.
You can cast Dark Secret once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell. You can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

Choose a creature that you can see within 30 feet of you that can hear you. The target must make a DC{{mark of the accursed archive:dc}} Wisdom saving throw. If they fail, they are frightened until the start of your next turn. Once per short or long rest you can cast Dark Secret once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

description.p: You have been scarred by the power of the Ashen Wolf, and its fiery might burns within your soul. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Whenever you cast a spell that deals damage, you can choose to have it deal fire damage instead of the normal type.
You can cast Hunter’s Pace once as a 2nd-level spell without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell. You can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

sheet.description: Whenever you cast a spell that deals damage, you can choose to have it deal fire damage instead of the normal type. Once per short or long rest you can cast Hunter’s Pace once as a 2nd-level spell without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

description.p: You have been blessed by the Blackthorn, and it grants you strength and cunning. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Whenever you are adjacent to a corpse, you can touch it as an action to remove its heart. While you are holding the heart of a creature, you can crush it as a bonus action to gain advantage on your next attack roll or ability check.
You can cast Heartripper once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell. You can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

sheet.description: Whenever you cast a spell that deals damage, you can choose to have it deal fire damage instead of the normal type. Once per short or long rest you can cast Heartripper once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

description.p: You’ve been marked as a person of interest by the Conspiracy, though you may not know it. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: While you are holding an item, you can mark it with an invisible rune as a bonus action. While the item is marked and on the same plane as you, you always know the direction and distance to it. The rune can be removed as an action by any creature that can see it.
You can cast Sinister Threat once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell. You can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

Once per short or long rest you can cast Sinister Threat once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

description.p: You’ve stood within the radiant light of the Eternal Citadel, and it has granted you power. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Whenever you are within 10 feet of a friendly creature and it takes damage, you can use your reaction take the Search action and then move up to 30 feet towards the source of the damage if you can perceive it.
You can cast Lesser Restoration once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell. You can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

Once per short or long rest you can cast Lesser Restoration once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

description.p: You’ve been marked by the Exile, causing the stars themselves to regard you with interest. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: While you can see the sky, you can use your bonus action to emit bright magical light in a radius of 60 feet, and dim light in a radius of 60 feet beyond that. The light continues to emit from you until you dismiss it as a bonus action or you go to a location where you can’t see the sky.
You can cast Augury once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell. You can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

description.p: You’ve stood on the border between life and death, and the experience has marked you. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Whenever you are reduced to 0 hit points, spectral apparitions surround you and strike out at your foes. Each hostile creature within 20 feet of you takes necrotic damage equal to your character level.
You can cast Suffer once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell. You can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

description.p: You’ve been touched by the wiggly ooze of the Convocation, and it has marked you. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: As an action, you can touch an object and coat it in thick adhesive slime. The next time that object touches another object, it becomes bound to it as though by strong glue. The glue can be broken if a creature uses its action to make a Strength check with a DC equal to your Charisma score. Once broken, the glue vanishes.
You can cast Enlarge/Reduce once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell. You can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

Once per short or long rest you can cast Enlarge/Reduce once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

description.p: You’ve created an artwork of incredible skill, marking yourself among the great artists. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Whenever you create an artwork, you can choose to imbue it with a figment of motion. The art will move realistically as though alive, following a pattern that you have predetermined upon its creation.
You can cast Mirror Image once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell. You can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

element.name: Mark of the Keeper of the Depths

description.p: Your flesh has been marked by the eldritch tentacles of the Keeper of the Depths. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: You can breathe normally in water, and you gain a swimming speed equal to your walking speed. If you already have either of these benefits, your swimming speed is doubled.
You can cast Devilish Hunt once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell. You can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

Once per short or long rest you can cast Devilish Hunt once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

description.p: You are blessed by the eternal song of the Perfect Chord, for it has marked your soul. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Whenever you cast a spell, you can choose a 5-foot cube within 30 feet of you. Until the start of your next turn, the area within that cube is magically silenced.
You can cast Shatter once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell. You can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

Once per short or long rest you can cast Shatter once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

description.p: You bear the imperial mark of the Empress, either willingly or as a curse. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Whenever you take damage from a spell, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage you take by an amount equal to 1d6 + your character level.
You can cast Command once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell. You can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

Once per short or long rest you can cast Command once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

description.p: Your nightmares now bow to you, for the Shadowcat’s mark is upon your soul. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Whenever you take the Hide action and successfully become undetected, you can move normally up to 30 feet before losing the benefits of being hidden.
You can cast Duskwalk once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell. You can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

Once per short or long rest you can cast Duskwalk once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

description.p: Your flesh has been scarred by the thunderous power of the Storm Lord. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Whenever you cast a spell as an action, you gain the benefits of the Dash action, and your jumping height and distance are doubled until the start of your next turn.
You can cast Feather Fall once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell. You can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

description.p: You have been blessed by the Warrior-Saint, as it has noted your devotion to balance. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to push your attacker 10 feet directly away from you. Creatures more than one size larger than you are immune to this effect.
You can cast Detect Interference once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell. You can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

element.name: Mark of the Weaver of Lies

description.p: Your regrets have led you to the Weaver, and it has marked you as one of its own. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Whenever you are disguised, you can choose to magically alter your speech and voice to be perfectly suited to your role. This cannot be detected without the use of magic.
You can cast Falling Spider’s Spite once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell. You can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

description.p: Your prowess has been noted by the Wild Huntsman, and it has marked your flesh in turn. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Whenever you move at least 20 feet during your turn before making a melee weapon attack with advantage, you can choose to make the attack without advantage. When you do and the attack hits, the target is knocked prone.
You can cast Wolfbane Trap once without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell. You can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
